newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Paracelsus starts as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Paracelsus starts as buy.

text.p: --Chicago Corp said Friday it initiated coverage of Paracelsus Healthcare Corp with a buy rating.

--It said the company, which holds a strong market position, should realize significant margin improvements through the management team of Champion Healthcare Corp, with which Paracelsus recently marged.
--Chicago Corp estimates EPS for the company of $0.45 for 1996, $0.70 for 1997 and $0.85 for 1988.
